item.title: Adding Helm Repo
item.description: A Helm Repo that's in https://github.com/codecentric/helm-charts has a corresponding repo URL. Add it as follows: 1user@example:~$ helm repo add codecentric https://codecentric.github.io/helm-charts 2"codecentric" has been added to your repositories

item.title: Installing Software using Helm
item.description: Say you want install jenkins and corresponding repo already added. 1user@example:~$ helm install jenkins codecentric/jenkins 2NAME: jenkins 3LAST DEPLOYED: Sun Jun 28 09:59:52 2020 4NAMESPACE: default 5STATUS: deployed 6REVISION: 1 7TEST SUITE: None 8NOTES: 9************************************************************************ 10* * 11* Jenkins Helm Chart by codecentric AG * 12* * 13************************************************************************ 1415In case the chart was installed with the default configuration and you did not 16configure an admin user, Jenkins creates one per default.
